decision_conditions: Due to insufficient information submitted for Condition 9 (Drainage Strategy) of planning permission 21/04084/FUL, the applicant has failed to provide and include drainage calculations for the total site area within the proposed SuDS design. Therefore, the proposal fails to demonstrate that it would prevent the development from increasing the risk of flooding to the site itself or elsewhere, thereby conflicting with Policy SI.13 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS1 and DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
